903860.name: Warlords Awakening Early Access Package
903860.description:
The Warlords Awakening Early Access Package is for players who have already purchased and started playing Warlords Awakening and feel like adding some special Early Access exclusive content to their game. The package includes the following content:

  • Exclusive Black Dragon Pet
  • Exclusive Black Ninja Costume
  • Exclusive Early Access "First Born" Title
  • In-game Mint Shouts x 20
  • Social "Group Dance" Emote x 5
  • Magic Appearance Change Ticket x 3
  • HP/MP Recovery Flask (50%) - 60 Min x 20
  • Stat Option Change Scroll [Unique] x 50
  • Skill Option Change Scroll [Unique] x 50

Note: Purchase of this package by itself does not grant you access to the game
903860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
